Portal 2 single-player is longer than Portal 1, way longer, from 3 to 4h on the first to 8 to 10h on the second. In my opinion it drags out too much. After chapter 6 (of 9) I wished it would end already.

The puzzles are nice, I had to scratch my head on some, really well thought out. I only got stuck on one, I was doing everything right but doing it not as intend, wich shouldn't be an option anyway.

Without spoiling, the end is... far-fetched and not believable. That shouldn't work.

The voice actors are really good, though the sarcasm it's too drawn out, like the game, it's too much.

Got this game from Steam Summer Sale this year (2017) it was on sale for $2 even at it's orignal price of $22 I would highly recommend this game.

Hours of fun, game's not overally difficult of course at times some tests can be a bit annoying (if you don't know what you're doing) but the canpagin is great, multiplayer is even more fun (imo) I would recommend playing with someone you know 


(you can play with people who are also looking for a co-op partner but more fun with someone you know or can communicate with.)

I used to own this game on Xbox 360 years ago and for the price it was/is right now was well worth the wait.

La secuela de Portal, llena de nuevas mecanicas y fisicas incleibles, con una campaÃ±a llena de emocion y risas con solamente 2 personajes con dialogo y el Soundtrack. Si te quedaste con ganas de mas Portal puedes jugar los mapas de la comunidad y sacar mas horas a este grandioso juego.
Me gusta su modo cooperativo, muy divertido para jugar con alguien de tu agrado :D
Piece of art, I rate it a solid 10/9 I'm having great fun
You can't call yourself a gamer if you haven't played this classic. Old but gold.
Gran juego, te hace pensar bastante todo el tiempo y a veces puedes estar 30 minutos pensando en un solo mapa, 100% recomendado

This game is really good, even in 2017, it's still better than A LOT of games. Because it has that atmosphere, you be happy everytime you accomplish something. And there are different ways to solve a puzzle, its not just like ''You have to do that, that's wrong etc.'' You can do whatever you want. 

8/10 because some parts of the game were really long, not because I was slow, because it was long.
Great game. Recommend to anyone looking for a cheap and really good game.
Fun gameplay, good story with an interesting lure. If you are looking for a good puzzle game or an   interesting sci-fi story you should get the portal games bundle
this game is tops i love it
